original_title: Ginga -Nagareboshi Gin- Gajo Kessen Hen (The Battle of the Stronghold)
overview: Based on the popular Japanese manga series "Ginga -Nagareboshi Gin-" by Takahashi Yoshihiro, this stage musicals follow the story of an Akita dog Gin, the son of the mighty hunting dog Riki.
title: Ginga -Nagareboshi Gin- Gajo Kessen Hen (The Battle of the Stronghold)
